48b04cf3-9123-4010-824f-da4a6adbaf12.description: Earners of this badge have an in-depth understanding of the principles and methodologies of UXUI design. They have a working knowledge of the tools required to create usable and desirable digital products. They have used tools to understand users (UX research, empathy mapping, personas, usability testing) and design solid solutions (visual design principles, customer journeys, navigation, user flows). They have successfully built and presented 2 projects for real clients.

741ee970-9d18-438d-b80a-424cb964c6e9.description: Earners of this badge have learned the core principles and methodologies of service design.
